MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: // Define the connection-string with your values. const utility::string_t storage_connection_string(U("DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName=your_storage_account;AccountKey=your_storage_account_key"));
// Define the connection-string with Azure Storage Emulator. const utility::string_t storage_connection_string(U("UseDevelopmentStorage=true;"));
// Retrieve storage account from connection string. azure::storage::cloud_storage_account storage_account = azure::storage::cloud_storage_account::parse(storage_connection_string);
